record.dc:title: 6CP9(K) TVA-897 Harris Farm Site 6CP9, Campbell County, Tennessee. Mound 2. Feature 6, clay altar on floor of secondary structure, square in form.
record.wpa:narrative: See Diagram. Hard baked clay, fire pit in center about 12" deep. Hard baked depressions (circular) in corners of altar 2 inches deep.
record.wpa:comments: Observer illustration on file at the institution. See also photographs 9-181 [fhm00663], 9-184 [fhm00666], 9-317 [fhm00673], 9-324 [fhm00679], 9-325 [fhm00680], 9-326 [fhm00681], 9-327 [fhm00682], 9-832 [fhm00713], 6CP9(C) [fhm01785], 6CP9(D) [fhm01786], 6CP9(F) [fhm01788], 6CP9(L) TVA-898 [fhm01794], and 6CP9(N) TVA-900 [fhm01796].
